response.original_title: Super Why!: Super Why! Sleeping Beauty and Other Fairytale Adventures
response.overview: Delve into a magical journey with "Super Why! Sleeping Beauty and Other Fairytale Adventures," a delightful DVD that brings together beloved tales with a modern twist. PBS Kids' animation at its best, this DVD features a 113-minute run time packed with enchanting stories that will captivate both children and parents alike. The DVD, in its original sealed packaging, is a treasure for fans of family-friendly entertainment. It offers a seamless blend of fun and learning, making it an ideal addition to any young fan's collection. Whether it's storytime or a sunny afternoon, these adventures await to whisk you away to a world of imagination and wonder.
response.title: Super Why!: Super Why! Sleeping Beauty and Other Fairytale Adventures
